my-portfolio.name: details
my-portfolio.label: details
my-portfolio.value:
Self-starter with a positive attitude, polite, straight-talking, and highly effective at work with a diverse association of technical professionals. A team comes first, honest and effective communicator, able to bridge departments and respond to varied needs.

I enjoy automating complex systems using infrastructure as a code and like to be leading build and release management process across the organization. I prefer to work and familiar with technologies Jenkins, GIT, Chef, Puppet, AWS, Docker, Cloud computing, Maven, uDeploy, and scripting.
